headline: Down 20%, Should You Buy the Dip on BigBear.ai (BBAI) Stock?
summary: BigBear.ai has been likened to a "mini Palantir." Will its stock also skyrocket?

headline: Investor Michael Burry Reveals Options Bet Against Oracle
summary: Burry owns put options on Oracle shares, he said in a Substack post after markets closed on Friday.  Burry, who revealed bearish bets against AI chipmaker Nvidia Corp. and Palantir Technologies Inc. in November, also directly shorted Oracle during the last six months, he said.

raw.headline: Investor Michael Burry Reveals Options Bet Against Oracle

headline: Palantir Billionaire Peter Thiel Bought 2 Stocks Warren Buffett and Bill Gates Sold. Who's Right?
